prompts: Create a mystical water-type Pokemon with a shimmering blue body and a graceful tail.
Imagine a fairy-type Pokemon that combines elements of the ocean and magic in its design.
Design a Pokemon resembling a protective spirit from the sea with vibrant colors and unique features.
Generate a water and fairy-type creature that glows softly in the moonlight and dances on waves.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature and water, with elegant flowing shapes and colors.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with a mysterious aura, adorned with aquatic motifs and vibrant shades.
Give me a Pokemon that blends the characteristics of water and mythical elements in a stunning way.

distinctive_features: Shimmering skin with a magical appearance
